subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Marco Dawson made a 15-foot par putt on the par-4 18th for a five-under-par 67 and the second-round lead in the Tucson Conquistadores Classic in Arizona, a Champions Tour event.
snippet: Marco Dawson made a 15-foot par putt on the par-4 18th for a five-under-par 67 and the second-round lead in the Tucson Conquistadores Classic in Arizona, a Champions Tour event.
